info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.sca-rga.interieur.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response: HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Accept-Ranges: bytes Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none' ; connect-src http: https: ws: ; font-src 'self' http: https: ws: data: ; img-src 'self' http: https: ws: data: ; media-src 'self' https: http: ws:; script-src 'self' http: https: ws:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' http: https: ws:; Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 03 Jul 2022 01:34:12 GMT Etag: "457-5d99e2b1e00c0-gzip" Expect-Ct: max-age=86400, enforce Last-Modified: Mon, 07 Mar 2022 10:17:15 GMT Set-Cookie: YOMe1h3tgHKNQxhV6V7n5g__=v1cXPKgwSD3ub; Expires=Sun, 03-Jul-2022 03:34:12 GMT; Path=/ Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000; includeSubDomains; preload Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: sameorigin X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Accueil | Référentiel Général des Armes

request:
OPTIONS / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.sca-rga.interieur.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Allow: GET,HEAD,POST,OPTIONS,HEAD,HEAD
Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none' ; connect-src http: https: ws: ;  font-src 'self' http: https: ws: data: ; img-src 'self' http: https: ws: data: ; media-src 'self' https: http: ws:; script-src 'self' http: https: ws:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' http: https: ws:;
Content-Type: text/html
Date: Sun, 03 Jul 2022 01:34:15 GMT
Expect-Ct: max-age=86400, enforce
Set-Cookie: YOMe1h3tgHKNQxhV6V7n5g__=v1bnPKgwSDF09; Expires=Sun, 03-Jul-2022 03:34:15 GMT; Path=/
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000; includeSubDomains; preload
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: sameorigin
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block
Content-Length: 0
